column.name: Description
column.value: Contains references of all core extension

column.name: plugin
column.value:
<plugin name="Core framework extensions" description="Contains references of all core extension" id="org.columba.core" version="1.0" category="framework" synchronized="2017-03-21 07:41:16" enabled="true"> <extensionlist id="org.columba.core.action"> <!--<extension id="OpenNewWindow" class="org.columba.core.gui.menu.OpenNewWindowSubmenu"/>--> <extension id="OpenNewMailWindow" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.OpenNewMailWindowAction"/>
<extension id="OpenNewAddressbookWindow" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.OpenNewAddressbookWindowAction"/> <extension id="OpenNewMessageFrameWindow" class="org.columba.core.gui.action.OpenNewMessageFrameWindowAction"/> <extension id="PluginManagerDialog" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.PluginManagerAction" /> <extension id="GlobalOptions" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.GlobalOptionsAction"/> <extension id="OpenExternalToolsDialog" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.OpenExternalToolsDialogAction"/> <extension id="OpenProfileManagerDialog" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.OpenProfileManagerDialogAction"/> <extension id="ChoosePerspectiveSubmenu" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.SwitchPerspectiveSubmenu"/> <extension id="NewSubmenu" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.NewSubmenu"/> <extension id="ShowHideViewSubmenu" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ShowHideViewSubmenu"/> <extension id="ViewFolderInfoPanel" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ViewFolderInfoPanelAction"/> <extension id="ViewLog" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ViewLogAction"/> <extension id="Macro" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.BeanshellManagerAction"/>
<extension id="Cut" singleton="true" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.CutAction"/> <extension id="Copy" singleton="true" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.CopyAction"/> <extension id="Paste" singleton="true" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.PasteAction"/> <extension id="Delete" singleton="true" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.DeleteAction"/> <extension id="SelectAll" singleton="true" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.SelectAllAction"/> <extension id="PrintSetup" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.PrintSetupAction"/>
<extension id="WorkOffline" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.WorkOfflineAction"/> <extension id="Close" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.CloseAction"/> <extension id="Exit" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ExitAction"/> <extension id="Undo" singleton="true" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.UndoAction"/> <extension id="Redo" singleton="true" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.RedoAction"/> <extension id="FindAgain" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.FindAgainAction"/> <extension id="ViewToolbar" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ViewToolbarAction"/> <extension id="Cancel" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.CancelAction"/>
<!-- help menu --> <extension id="ShowHomepage" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ShowHomepageAction"/> <extension id="ShowBugDatabase" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ShowBugDatabaseAction"/> <extension id="ShowFAQ" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ShowFAQAction"/> <extension id="ShowHelp" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ShowHelpAction"/> <extension id="ShowLicense" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ShowLicenseAction"/> <extension id="ShowProjectPage" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ShowProjectPageAction"/> <extension id="AboutDialog" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.AboutDialogAction"/> <extension id="ShowContextSpecificHelp" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.ShowContextSpecificHelpAction" /> <extension id="Donate" class="org.columba.core.gui.globalactions.DonateAction" /> <extension id="InfoProduct" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoProduct" /> <extension id="InfoBPartner" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoBPartner"/> <extension id="InfoAccount" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoAccount"/> <extension id="InfoOrder" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoOrder"/> <extension id="InfoInvoice" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoInvoice"/> <extension id="InfoInOut" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoInOut"/> <extension id="InfoPayment" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoPayment"/> <extension id="InfoCashLine" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoCashLine"/> <extension id="InfoAssignment" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoAssignment"/> <extension id="InfoAsset" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoAsset"/> <extension id="InfoBOE" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoBOE"/> <extension id="InfoCashFlow" class="org.xendra.core.ui.action.InfoCashFlow"/>
<!-- Window --> <extension id="WindowMenu" class="org.compiere.apps.WindowMenu"/> </extensionlist>
<extensionlist id="org.columba.core.component"> <!--<extension id="MailComponent" class="org.columba.mail.main.MailMain" />--> <!--<extension id="AddressbookComponent" class="org.columba.addressbook.main.AddressbookMain" />--> <!-- <extension id="XendraComponent" class="org.xendra.main.Main" />--> </extensionlist>
<extensionlist id="org.columba.core.config"> <extension id="PlasticConfigPlugin" class="org.columba.core.gui.themes.plugin.PlasticLookAndFeelConfigPlugin" /> </extensionlist> <extensionlist id="org.columba.core.externaltools"> <extension id="aspell" class="org.columba.core.gui.externaltools.ASpellPlugin" /> <extension id="gpg" class="org.columba.core.gui.externaltools.GPGPlugin" /> <extension id="spamc" class="org.columba.mail.spam.spamassassin.SpamcExternalToolPlugin" /> <extension id="spamassassin" class="org.columba.mail.spam.spamassassin.SpamAssassinExternalToolPlugin" /> <extension id="sa-learn" class="org.columba.mail.spam.spamassassin.SALearnExternalToolPlugin" /> </extensionlist>
<!--<extensionlist id="org.columba.core.frame"> <extension id="ThreePaneMail" class="org.columba.mail.gui.frame.ThreePaneMailFrameController"> <properties managed="true" /> </extension> <extension id="Addressbook" class="org.columba.addressbook.gui.frame.AddressbookFrameController"> <properties managed="true" /> </extension> <extension id="Composer" class="org.columba.mail.gui.composer.ComposerController"> <properties managed="false" /> </extension> <extension id="MessageFrame" class="org.columba.mail.gui.messageframe.MessageFrameController"> <properties managed="false" /> </extension> </extensionlist>-->
<extensionlist id="org.columba.core.htmlviewer"> <extension id="Default" class="org.columba.core.gui.htmlviewer.JavaHTMLViewerPlugin" /> <extension id="JDIC" class="org.columba.core.gui.htmlviewer.JDICHTMLViewerPlugin" /> </extensionlist>
<extensionlist id="org.columba.core.service"> <extension id="BeanshellService" singleton="true" class="org.columba.core.scripting.BeanshellService" /> </extensionlist>
<extensionlist id="org.columba.core.theme"> <extension id="Quaqua" class="org.columba.core.gui.themes.plugin.QuaquaLookAndFeelPlugin" /> <extension id="Xendra" class="org.columba.core.gui.themes.plugin.XendraLookAndFeelPlugin" /> <extension id="Metal" class="org.columba.core.gui.themes.plugin.MetalLookAndFeelPlugin" /> <extension id="Windows" class="org.columba.core.gui.themes.plugin.WindowsLookAndFeelPlugin" /> <extension id="Mac" class="org.columba.core.gui.themes.plugin.MacLookAndFeelPlugin" /> <extension id="CDE/Motif" class="org.columba.core.gui.themes.plugin.MotifLookAndFeelPlugin" /> <extension id="Gtk" class="org.columba.core.gui.themes.plugin.GtkLookAndFeelPlugin" /> <extension id="Plastic" class="org.columba.core.gui.themes.plugin.PlasticLookAndFeelPlugin"> <properties config="PlasticConfigPlugin" /> </extension> <extension id="System Default" class="org.columba.core.gui.theme.plugin.SystemLookAndFeelPlugin"/> </extensionlist>
<extensionlist id="org.columba.core.view"> <extension id="ThreePaneMail" class="org.columba.mail.gui.frame.MailFrameView" /> <extension id="Composer" class="org.columba.mail.gui.composer.ComposerView" /> <extension id="MessageFrame" class="org.columba.mail.gui.messageframe.MessageFrameView" /> <extension id="Addressbook" class="org.columba.addressbook.gui.frame.AddressbookFrameView" /> </extensionlist>
<extensionlist id="org.columba.core.service"> <extension id="BeanshellService" singleton="true" class="org.columba.core.scripting.BeanshellService" /> </extensionlist>
</plugin>
